rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 17 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 3:19 PM, 07 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Pampanga, Bataan, Bulacan, Rizal, Metro Manila, Cavite, Batangas and Laguna within the next 2-3 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Quezon(San Francisco, San Andres), Nueva Ecija(Jaen, General Tinio, Penaranda, Gapan, San Antonio) and Zambales(Candelaria, Masinloc) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
